editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Energy Drink is appreciated worldwide by top athletes, busy professionals, university students and travellers on long journeys

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Wings without sugar: Red Bull Sugarfree is Red Bull Energy Drink without sugar

editions.name: The Winter Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Winter Edition with the exceptional taste of Blueberry, Vanilla and fresh notes of eucalyptus

editions.name: The Green Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Green Edition with the exotic taste of Dragon Fruit

editions.name: The Red Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Red Edition with Watermelon taste. With all the freshness of summer
